info.description: Check JEMS application for common use-cases

item.name: retrieve and save available input language

exec: pm.test('we can retrieve programme languages', function() {
pm.test('we have input language available', function() {
console.log('There is input language ' + inputLanguage + ' enabled, we will use this during test');
pm.test('we have system language available', function() {
console.log('There is system language ' + systemLanguage + ' enabled, we will use this during test');
pm.test('we can retrieve priorities and specific objectives', function() {
pm.test('we have programme priority or we need to create one', function() {
console.log('There is already specific objective ' + policy + ', which we will use for calls during this test');
console.log('There is already a programme priority, but no specific objective. We have to create one.');
console.log('There are no any programme priorities yet. We need to create one.');

item.name: [IF] not exists, then create programme priority with policy

exec: console.log('There is no any programme priority specific objective we can use, so we need to create one.');
console.log('There is already a programme priority with specific objective, so we will use that one.');
pm.test('programme priority was created if needed', function() {
console.log('We did an invalid POST to NOT create new programme priority, no variable is changing.');
pm.test('we can retrieve programme funds', function() {
pm.test('we have programme fund or we need to enable first one', function() {
console.log('There are selected funds with id ' + fundId + ' and id ' + fundId_2);
console.log('There are no any programme funds yet enabled. We need to enable 2.');

item.name: [IF] not exists, then enable some programme fund Copy

exec: console.log('There is no enough programme funds enabled, so we need to enable few.');
console.log('There are already at least 2 programme funds enabled, so we will use that one.');
console.log('We did an invalid POST to NOT enable new programme funds, no variable is changing.');
pm.test('we can retrieve programme lump sums', function() {
pm.test('we have programme lump sum or we need to create one', function() {
console.log('There is already some splittable lumpSum ' + response[0].name + ' with id=' + response[0].id + ', which we will use for calls during this test');
console.log('There are no any splittable programme lumpSum yet. We need to create one.');

item.name: [IF] not exists, then create splittable programme lumpSum

exec: console.log('There is no any splittable programme lump sum we can use, so we need to create one.');
console.log('There is already a splittable programme lump sum, so we will use that one.');
pm.test('programme lump sum was created (as it was needed)', function() {
console.log('We created new programme lump sum with id=' + response.id);
console.log('We did an invalid POST to NOT create new lump sum.');
pm.test('we can retrieve programme unit costs', function() {
pm.test('we have programme 1-category unit cost or we need to create one', function() {
console.log('There is already some 1-category unitCost ' + response[0].name + ' with id=' + response[0].id + ', which we will use for calls during this test');
console.log('There are no any splittable programme unitCost yet. We need to create one.');

item.name: [IF] not exists, then create 1-category programme unitCost

exec: console.log('There is no any 1-category programme unit cost we can use, so we need to create one.');
console.log('There is already a 1-category programme unit cost, so we will use that one.');
pm.test('programme unit cost was created (as if was needed)', function() {
console.log('We created new programme unit cost with id=' + response.id);
console.log('We did an invalid POST to NOT create new unit cost.');
pm.test('call flatrate setup is saved successfully', function () {
